section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
relevant_communication: Lucrativo has received funding and support for System and Digital Platform development from Business Finland (Tekes) in 2018
goals__remit:
We offer legal, project and design services for CSR (corporate responsibility) and environmental issues. Digital application is being developed to help  implementation, calculations and reporting. Marketing management is part of the services. 
 
Lucrativo Sustainability Solutions analyses, develops and produces sustainability solutions.  
 
Within the development project supported by Business Finland the solutions are tested and finalised with pilot customers during the Spring 2018. The solutions are divided into three main sections: international CSR reporting, sustainable product design and sustainable concepts. The end products, although also depending on the customer's requests, are e.g. completed CSR reporting system, involving specified environmental policy, carbon footprint, LCA (life cycle analysis) as well as new design as a new sustainable product.
